character.name: David

appearance.hair: black hair, kept short on the sides, slightly longer on top
appearance.build: muscular, stocky build from construction work
appearance.distinguishing_features: strong jaw, broad nose, calloused strong hands, small turquoise pendant necklace (gift from grandmother)

character.occupation: Construction foreman for a residential building company, manages a crew of 8, oversees house-building projects in Albuquerque, NM
character.living_situation: Three-bedroom ranch-style house in Albuquerque, New Mexico with wife Sarah (33, dental hygienist), son Nathan (7, 2nd grade), and daughter Emma (4, preschool)
character.car: Dark blue Ford F-150 pickup truck with toolbox in the bed, 2022 model

style.work: Hard hat (yellow), orange reflective safety vest, cargo pants (tan), company polo or flannel shirt, brown leather steel-toe work boots, tool belt, safety glasses
style.home_casual: Jeans, t-shirt or flannel shirt, sneakers or western boots, sometimes an Albuquerque Isotopes baseball cap
style.reservation_visit: Clean jeans, western button-up shirt, turquoise jewelry (necklace, occasionally a bracelet)

family.wife: Sarah (33, dental hygienist, light brown hair in ponytail)
family.son: Nathan (7, 2nd grade, dark hair, energetic, loves dinosaurs)
family.daughter: Emma (4, preschool, dark curly hair, shy but sweet, carries a stuffed rabbit)

notes.educational_context: This character represents a Native American (Navajo/Diné) father and construction foreman. Shows family life, skilled trades profession, and Indigenous cultural identity in a modern urban setting.
notes.cultural_context: Navajo heritage respected through turquoise jewelry, Navajo-pattern blanket, family values, and connection to reservation. David lives in Albuquerque but maintains ties to the Navajo Nation. Culture shown naturally, not stereotypically.
notes.pedagogical_goal: Help learners see Native American representation while learning construction vocabulary, family life vocabulary, and New Mexico regional context through a relatable father figure's daily activities.
